about_the_game:
The story begins in an orphanage where the main character, Dima, spends his childhood with his sister and friends. After that comes adulthood and the challenges that come with it.

Captivating Plot:

As an adult, the main character must come to terms with the horrific death of his sister. While navigating a big city, he needs to communicate and interact with friends and police officers to solve the case on his own. However, everything he believed turns out to be deceitful.

Interactive Dialogues:

Conversations with friends and police officers help Dima learn new things and find clues to unravel the mysteries. But there is another advisor—someone who may be a friend or an enemy. This person either wants to help Dima or lead him astray. Through dialogues, you will need to figure this out on your own and decide for yourself what to believe and what is true.

Interweaving of Reality and Imagination:

In this story, you will dive into a plot that is either a fabrication or occurring in reality. It's important to pay attention to the details of this universe and decide for yourself where the truth lies and where fiction begins.

Puzzles and Riddles:

Dima will have to solve puzzles related to finding items in order to advance in the investigation of his sister's murder. Some items will help him open passages, while others can be exchanged for useful things.

short_description: In a dark world where reality blends with illusion, you strive to uncover the mystery of your sister's death. Explore locations, interact with characters, and gather clues. Gradually, your mind begins to betray you, and each step could lead either to the truth or to madness.
